name: Force Post Content
author: Germain Guglielmetti

sections.description: This is a simple plugin which is designed to help the posters who sometimes forget to write the post content (main editing zone). Once activated, this plugin will force the users to give post content while adding new post to WordPress site. Whenever User tries to publish a post without giving content, it will give an alert to the user and also highlight the content area so that user can see where to write the post content. I have tested this plugin with WordPress 3.5.1 and it works fine. It should work with older versions of WordPress also.
sections.installation:
1. Upload force-post-content folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it.
sections.faq:
Plugin is not working as expected

If web browser doesn’t support JS, then this plugin will not work
